generator.product_name: Red Hat OVAL Patch Definition Merger

metadata.title: RHBA-2019:1992: cloud-init bug fix and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The cloud-init packages provide a set of init scripts for cloud instances. Cloud instances need special scripts to run during initialization to retrieve and install SSH keys, and to let the user run various scripts.

Users of cloud-init are advised to upgrade to these updated packages.

bugzilla.info: CVE-2019-0816 cloud-init: extra ssh keys added to authorized_keys on the Azure platform

criterion.@comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
cloud-init is earlier than 0:18.5-1.el8.4
cloud-init is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
Red Hat CoreOS 4 is installed

metadata.title: RHBA-2019:2715: virt:rhel bug fix update (Important)
metadata.description:
Bug Fix(es):

* qemu-kvm core dumped after hotplug the deleted disk with iothread parameter (BZ#1718992)

* Detached device when trying to upgrade USB device firmware when in doing USB Passthrough via QEMU (BZ#1719228)

bugzilla.info: heap buffer overflow during packet reassembly

criterion.@comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed

Red Hat CoreOS 4 is installed
